ðŸ“– Summary: Tewi is a text-based user interface (TUI) for managing the Transmission BitTorrent daemon. It allows users to connect to a Transmission daemon, browse torrents, view details, add new torrents, and perform various actions like starting, pausing, removing, and verifying torrents, all from a terminal.
